alert.note: Alert for Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 2:13AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Guadalupe, northeastern Karnes, southwestern Gonzales and northeastern Wilson Counties through 300 AM CST... At 213 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pandora, or 7 miles northeast of Kosciusko, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stockdale, Nixon, Smiley, Pandora, Gillett, Leesville, Oak Forest, Belmont, Wrightsboro, Cost, Bebe, Monthalia, and Sample. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
